title: Strengthening Clinical Competencies: Design and Implementation of Shadow Curricula in Medical Education

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can complete the analysis-design-development phases for shadow curriculum design by applying the ADDIE model
Learners can present at least three examples of shadow educational resources in blended environments and explain their utilization strategies
Learners can propose at least two curriculum improvement plans based on formative assessment results
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
